The successful tech company faces an ironic problem in the fall quarter; people are so excited about the next (i) ________ of its product, which will be released over the holidays, that they refuse to purchase the (ii) _________ version.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
A) ingenuity
D) obsolete
B) implication
E) current
C) iteration
F) practical
